public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object

      • create

        @PostMapping("/create")
Product create​(@RequestParam
               int accountId,
               @RequestParam
               java.lang.String name,
               @RequestParam
               int weight,
               @RequestParam
               boolean conditionUsed,
               @RequestParam
               double price,
               @RequestParam
               double discount,
               @RequestParam
               ProductCategory category,
               @RequestParam
               byte shipmentPlans)
        For post request to creates product.
        Parameters:
        accountId - account id.
        name - product name.
        weight - product weight.
        conditionUsed - product condition used. true if used, false if new.
        price - product price.
        discount - product discount.
        category - product category.
        shipmentPlans - shipment plan
        Returns:
        the product that have been made

java.util.List<Product> getProductByStore​(@RequestParam
                                          int id,

                                          int page,
                                          @RequestParam
                                          int pageSize)
        For get request to collect product list of a store.
        Parameters:
        id - account id of the store.
        page - page of product list.
        pageSize - page size of product list.
        Returns:
        product list of a store.

        @GetMapping("/getFiltered")
java.util.List<Product> getProductByFilter​(@RequestParam
                                           int page,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           int pageSize,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           int accountId,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           java.lang.String search,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           int minPrice,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           int maxPrice,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           ProductCategory category,
                                           @RequestParam
                                           boolean conditionUsed)
        For get request to get all product that have been filtered
        Parameters:
        page - page of list.
        pageSize - page size of list.
        accountId - account id.
        search - product name.
        minPrice - minimum price.
        maxPrice - maximum price.
        category - product category.
        Returns:
        all product that have been filtered with certain page and page size.
